'''Private Hudson''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|For Her Judgment Reaches to the Skies...}}.

==Profile==
{{Quote|It's done, man! It's done! What should we do now?|Private Hudson, after his defeat}}
While raiding a [[Fatui]] hideout in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]], where Fatui classified documents stated [[Jeht]] had been taken to for her transfer back to [[Snezhnaya]], the [[Traveler]] encounters and defeats Private Hudson. It is unclear whether they kill him or not.

===Appearance===
<!--Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 2 paragraphs with 3-4 sentences each.-->
Private Hudson takes on the appearance of a [[Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire|Cryogunner Legionnaire]]

{{Quests and Events}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Like a few other characters featured in the ''Her Foes Rage Like Great Waters...'' Quest Series, Private Hudson is a shout-out to a movie character. He is a reference to {{w|Hudson (Aliens)|Private Hudson}} from the movie ''Aliens'', and more specifically to his famous quote ''"Game over, man! Game over! What [...] are we gonna do now?"'' (expletives omitted).
